items.sentence: Tom wasn\'t telling the truth about where he\'d been.
Tom and Mary sat next to each other in the classroom.
Tom was killed by a poison dart fired from a blowgun.
Tom writes home to his parents at least once a month.
Tom won\'t have to go through what Mary went through.
Tom held up the bottle to see how much wine was left.
It probably wouldn\'t be easy to do that by yourself.
I stopped what I was doing and turned to look at Tom.
I sure wish I could speak French as well as Tom does.
It\'s a beautiful night for a swim, don\'t you think?
